article_title: Reality check: Bernie Sanders' musical genius?
article_text: Kamau heads to Camden, N.J., to see if a new way of policing will help the relationship between the police and the people in this episode, "Protect and Serve?"

article_metadata.description: CNN's Tom Foreman does a realty check on some of the comments made by Democratic presidential candidates Bernie Sanders and Hillary Clinton during CNN's Democratic Town Hall.
